name: The Fat Tiger
description:
The Fat Tiger is a short and simple platform game where you will help Fat Tiger reach the top by jumping from platform to platform. You will need to dodge the enemies to avoid restarting the level.

Game Mechanics:

The players need to get to the finishing line to win their current level.   

The player needs to press the up button to make the character jump.
Players must press left or right to avoid their character falling from the platform.

In easy mode, players only need to avoid flying obstacles like Evil Bird.   

In medium mode, there will be some slippery slopes so it will add more challenge for the player to jump onto another platform. The player also needs to avoid flying and dropping obstacles like Evil Bird from easy mode and icicles.  

In hard mode, the player needs to reach the top quickly to avoid getting eaten by the shark. The shark will be chasing the player from below. Players will also need to keep an eye out for bubbles to avoid restarting the level.

Download Instruction:

Press the download button below

Right click the zipped file and choose 'Extract All' 

Double click 'My Game Done' 

Enjoy !
